name: Carpinteria Community Tennis and Pickleball Courts
description:
Contact us on Facebook:  Carpinteria Pickleball Club

Courts are located on the corner of 8th and Palm (turn onto Palm off of Carpinteria Ave)

Restrooms are located at the community pool during business hours and not available on Sunday’s when the community pool is closed.

Courts are only available after school hours during the week, weekends, holiday weeks and summers.

School gets out at 3 pm all weekdays except (1:30 on Wednesday)
open_play_schedule: The courts are used during the school year by the students.  School is out at 3 pm weekdays (1:30 on Wed)

name: Cathedral Oaks Athletic Club
description: Come play pickleball at Cathedral Oaks Athletic Club in Goleta, CA! There are 4 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. A membership is required to play. The facility includes amenities like restrooms and water.

name: Central Coast Tennis
description: Central Coast Tennis is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in Santa Maria, CA. There are 4 outdoor concrete courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. A membership is required to play. You can reserve the courts. Players have access to lights and restrooms.

name: Dynamite Pickleball
description: Go to dynamitepickleball.com to see updated schedule, as this is heavily programmed, with leagues, lessons, tournaments, open play, beginners etc.
open_play_schedule: Our schedule can be viewed in Court Reserve or found on our website (dynamitepickleball.com)
fees: Fee required — Prices vary based on event.

name: Evergreen Park
description: Evergreen Park is a place to play pickleball in Goleta, CA. There are 2 outdoor hard courts. The lines are permanent, but you'll need to bring your own net. Amenities include restrooms. The courts are free.

name: Goleta valley community courts
description: Goleta valley community courts is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in Goleta, CA. There are 5 outdoor asphalt courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. A one-time fee is required to play. The courts can be reserved. The facility includes amenities like lights and restrooms.
fees: Fee required — Fee required to reserve courts ($60/year)

name: Hagerman Sports Complex
description: Hagerman Sports Complex is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in Santa Maria, CA. There are 6 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. The courts are free. You can reserve the courts. Players have access to restrooms, wheelchair accessibility, and lights.

name: Hans Christian Andersen Park
description: Hans Christian Andersen Park is a place to play pickleball in Solvang, CA. There are 4 outdoor concrete courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. The courts are free. The facility includes amenities like restrooms and water.

name: Hilton Santa Barbara Beachfront Resort
description: Come play pickleball at Hilton Santa Barbara Beachfront Resort in Santa Barbara, CA! There are 6 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. A one-time fee is required to play. The facility includes amenities like restrooms. You can reserve the courts.
open_play_schedule: Reserve courts in 2-hour blocks of time.

name: Jonata Middle School
description: Jonata Middle School is a place to play pickleball in Buellton, CA. There are 3 indoor hard courts. The lines are permanent, and portable nets are available. A one-time fee is required to play. The facility includes amenities like restrooms.

name: Kellogg Pickleball Courts
description: Location official name is Kellogg Tennis Courts or Kellogg Open Space. The pickleball courts are now permanent. The last tennis court was converted to four pickleball courts, fences are between all the courts. A paddle-up line system is used at these courts. You rotate out after each game if there are people waiting in the paddle-up line.
open_play_schedule: Popular on weekends especially after lunch.

name: Minami Community Center
description: Come play pickleball at Minami Community Center in Santa Maria, CA! There are 3 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. Players have access to lights and restrooms. The courts are free.

name: Municipal Tennis and Pickleball Courts
description: Municipal Tennis and Pickleball Courts is a place to play pickleball in Santa Barbara, CA. There are 16 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. You can’t reserve the courts. A one-time fee is required to play. The facility includes amenities like restrooms and water.

name: Oak Park Tennis Courts
description: Oak Park Tennis Courts is a place to play pickleball in Santa Barbara, CA. There are 2 outdoor hard courts. The lines are permanent, but you'll need to bring your own net. Reservations are not available. Amenities include water. The courts are free.
hours: 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday - Thursday, and alternate Fridays . Mailing Address City of Santa Barbara, PO Box 1990 Santa Barbara, CA 93102-1990 Newsletters Sign up for one or more newsletters on many city topics ©2026 Copyright City of Santa Barbara Accessibility | Policies

name: Pershing Park
description: Come play pickleball at Pershing Park in Santa Barbara, CA! There are 4 outdoor hard courts. Tape lines have been laid, but you'll need to bring your own net. The facility includes amenities like restrooms, water, and lights. You can’t reserve the courts. The courts are free.

name: Providence Landing Park
description: Come play pickleball at Providence Landing Park in Lompoc, CA! There are 4 outdoor concrete courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. The courts are free.

name: Ryon Memorial Park
description: Ryon Memorial Park is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in Lompoc, CA. There are 8 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. Amenities include restrooms and lights. The courts are free.

name: Santa Maria YMCA
description: Santa Maria YMCA is a place to play pickleball in Orcutt, CA. There is 1 outdoor concrete court. This is a dedicated court with a permanent net and lines. A membership is required to play. Players have access to lights, locker rooms, water, and restrooms. You can reserve the court.
open_play_schedule:
Monday - Saturday Opening til Closing 
Hours Depending on Reservations Made or Open Play
